Generation V.Black: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
Generation V.White: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
Generation V.Black 2: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense.
Generation V.White 2: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense.

Generation VI.X: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
Generation VI.Y: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

Generation VIII.Sword: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.
Generation VIII.Shield: It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are not yet good at flying.

Generation IX.Scarlet: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
Generation IX.Violet: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
